name: Landless (itch)
description:
The game in the current state is in the prototype phase. Not much now but to grab a few guns and some enemies to gun down. The Idea is you have a limited amount of moves to make. If you hit zero, the game ends. I will update this game whenever I make major improvements. Long term, I want this game to be a survival roguelike with a light touch of board game mechanics. The map, gameplay and UI will all ultimately be overhauled and, of course, real gameplay will be added. Either way, enjoy. 

Controls - 

WASD - move

1-9 - select weapon(also scroll wheel)

B - backpack

Escape - pause menu(main menu is the only one enabled)

T - equip and unequip weapon.

G - grenade

Q ands E - camera left and right

X and C - camera zoom

Left Click-shoot
